alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Hancock; Jones; Putnam; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 3:26PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Baldwin, northwestern Wilkinson, south central Putnam, southern Hancock, northwestern Washington and northeastern Jones Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 326 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Underwood, or near Milledgeville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Gray, Deepstep, Midway-Hardwick, Meriwether, Ethridge, Devereux, James, Beulah, Coopers, Underwood, Allenwood, Haddock, Linton, Pancras, Greenberry Crossroads, Scottsboro, Plant Harlee Branch, Hardwick and Browns Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Hancock; Jones; Putnam; Washington; Wilkinson
